item.title: 3rd Party provider maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Scheduled Maintenance

Summary: eToro and a third party partner will undergo maintenance, causing a delay in payments for eToro Money users in Europe.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 20, 05:00 - 06:00 UTC

Mar 18, 07:43 UTC
Scheduled - To consistently ensure that you have the latest features and capabilities at your fingertips, both eToro and our third party partners perform periodic upgrades to our system.

One of our 3rd party partners will undergo maintenance on Wednesday, March 20, from 05:00 AM GMT for a short period.

During this window, there will be a delay in incoming and outgoing payments for eToro Money users in Europe, until after the maintenance has been completed.

Additionally, payments may also be unsuccessful during the maintenance window, and will need to be re-executed after its duration.

We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your understanding in this matter.

Sincerely,
The eToro team

item.title: 3rd Party provider maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Scheduled Maintenance

eToro and its third-party partner are performing periodic upgrades to the system. There will be a delay in outgoing payments for eToro Money users in Europe during the maintenance. Incoming payments may be unsuccessful and will need to be re-executed after the maintenance is completed.

Summary: Maintenance is scheduled for a specific period, causing delays in outgoing payments for eToro Money users in Europe. Incoming payments may be unsuccessful during the maintenance window.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 17, 02:00 - 03:00 UTC

Mar 13, 13:56 UTC
Scheduled - To consistently ensure that you have the latest features and capabilities at your fingertips, both eToro and our third party partners perform periodic upgrades to our system.

One of our 3rd party partners will undergo maintenance on Sunday, March 17, from 02:00 AM to 03:00 AM (GMT).

During this window, there will be a delay in outgoing payments for eToro Money users in Europe, until after the maintenance has been completed.

Additionally, incoming payments may be unsuccessful during the maintenance window, and will need to be re-executed after its duration.

We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your understanding in this matter.

Sincerely,
The eToro team

item.title: Scheduled Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Ethereum Network Upgrade (Dencun)

The Ethereum $ETH blockchain will undergo a scheduled network upgrade (“Dencun”) on March 13th 2024 at approximately 13:55 UTC. During this time, eToro Money crypto wallet send services for $ETH will not be available, and coin transfer services may experience delays. Additionally, send services for ERC-20 tokens will not be available for this period. Trading of $ETH is not expected to be affected unless the upgraded network is deemed unstable.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 13, 13:55 - 14:55 UTC

Mar 12, 08:40 UTC
Scheduled - Please note that the Ethereum $ETH blockchain will undergo a scheduled network upgrade (“Dencun”).

The upgrade is estimated to take place on March 13th 2024, at epoch #2,695,682, at approximately 13:55 UTC and should last for a short period.

eToro Money crypto wallet send services for $ETH will not be available for one hour prior to as well as during the fork.

Coin transfer services for $ETH may not be fully available for 3 hours prior to as well as during the fork, and coin transfer requests will be delayed until the upgrade has completed, and the network deemed stable.

Additionally, send services for ERC-20 tokens will not be available for this period.

Accessing and trading of $ETH are not expected to be affected unless we deem the upgraded network unstable. If this occurs, $ETH trading services will be disabled until the network stabilizes.

item.title: Cryptos wrongly triggered by TP
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Cryptos Triggering Issue Investigation Summary: The company is currently investigating a production issue where cryptos have been wrongly triggered by TP with at least 15 cases reported. The impact of this issue is significant enough to warrant the attention of the T3 and Trading teams, and an update is expected within 3 hours.

Mar 4, 13:10 UTC
Investigating - Hello All,
We've detected the following issue in production and are currently investigating

Issue:
Cryptos wrongly triggered by TP

Impact:
At least 15 cases incoming so far

Team assigned:
T3, Trading

An update will be provided within 3 hours or with significant updates

item.title: 319 - EuroNatGas is not available for trading - Investigating
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - EuroNatGas Incorrect Execution Price

Our engineering team is currently working to resolve the issue of an incorrect execution price for EuroNatGas. We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Thank you for your understanding. Summary: Investigating incorrect execution price for EuroNatGas.

Feb 26, 13:45 UTC
Investigating - Hello,
Please note that we are currently experiencing incorrect execution price for 319 - EuroNatGas.
Our engineering team is working hard to resolve the issue.
We appreciate your understanding and apologize for the inconvenience.

Sincerely,
The eToro Team

item.title: 3rd Party provider maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Jan 18, 03:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 17, 22:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 12, 18:41 UTC
Scheduled - One of our 3rd party partners will undergo maintenance on January 17th between 22:00 GMT and 03:00 GMT. During this maintenance window, there is expected to be a short period of downtime of up to two minutes, during which your eToro card may not be functional.

We recommend that you retry card transactions, or have another card with you during this timeframe.

Additionally, inbound and outgoing bank payments may be unsuccessful during the maintenance window. Customers are advised to try again after 30 minutes.
